ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides a structured 120-day curriculum for mastering CUDA programming. It includes daily lessons with exercises, debugging advice, and resource suggestions, culminating in six capstone projects to solidify skills in GPU parallel programming, memory management, and performance optimization. The curriculum covers topics such as GPU vs. CPU architecture, thread hierarchy, kernel launch and execution, and memory management.
